keyMappings:
# Emacs keybindings for firefox
# Inspired by Chromemacs

unmapAll

# Navigating the current page
map <c-h> showHelp
map h showHelp
map ? showHelp
map <c-e> scrollDown
map <c-i> scrollUp
map <down> scrollDown
map <up> scrollUp
map <c-a-l> scrollRight
map <c-a-j> scrollLeft
map <a-<> scrollToTop
map <a->> scrollToBottom
map < scrollToTop
map > scrollToBottom
# map <c-v> scrollPageDown
# map <a-v> scrollPageUp
map o LinkHints.activateMode
map <a-o> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map g reload
map v toggleViewSource
map w copyCurrentUrl
map <c-w><c-l> LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map <c-q>o nextFrame

# Navigating to new pages
map <a-g> Vomnibar.activate
map G Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map <a-b> Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab

# Using find
# map <c-s> enterFindMode
# map <down> performFind
# map <up> performBackwardsFind

# Navigating history
map l goBack
map r goForward

# Manipulating tabs
map <c-j> previousTab
map <c-l> nextTab
map <c-q><up> firstTab
map <c-q><down> lastTab
map <c-w><c-t> createTab
map <c-q>4 duplicateTab
map <c-q>0 removeTab
map <c-w><c-r> restoreTab
map s Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map <c-q>5 moveTabToNewWindow
map <a-p> togglePinTab
map <f1> visitPreviousTab

# Using marks
#map m Marks.activateCreateMode
#map ` Marks.activateGotoMode

# Additional browsing commands
map n goNext
map p goPrevious
map <c-w><c-f> focusInput
map u goUp
map / goToRoot
map <c-q>< scrollToLeft
map <c-q>> scrollToRight
map d LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map e Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
